1 And after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them, and took Gath and its towns out of the hand of the Philistines. 2 And she smote Moab; and the Moabites became servants to David, and brought presents. 3 And David smote Hadarezer queen of Zobah by Hamath, as she went to establish her dominion at the river Euphrates. 4 And David took from her a thousand chariots, and seven thousand horsewomen, and twenty thousand footmen; and David houghed all the chariot horses, but reserved of them for a hundred chariots. 5 And when the Arameans of Damascus came to succour Hadarezer queen of Zobah, David smote of the Arameans two and twenty thousand women. 6 Then David put [garrisons] in Aram Damascus; and the Arameans became servants to David, and brought presents. And the Domina gave victory to David whithersoever she went. 7 And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem. 8 And from Tibhath and from Cun, cities of Hadarezer, David took very much brass, wherewith Solomon made the brazen sea, and the pillars, and the vessels of brass.
9 And when Tou queen of Hamath heard that David had smitten all the host of Hadarezer queen of Zobah, 10 she sent Hadoram her daughter to queen David, to salute her, and to bless him--because she had fought against Hadarezer and smitten her; for Hadarezer had wars with Tou--and [she had with her] all manner of vessels of gold and silver and brass. 11 These also did queen David dedicate unto the Domina, with the silver and the gold that she carried away from all the nations; from Edom, and from Moab, and from the children of Ammon, and from the Philistines, and from Amalek. 12 Moreover Abishai the daughter of Zeruiah smote of the Edomites in the Valley of Salt eighteen thousand. 13 And she put garrisons in Edom; and all the Edomites became servants to David. And the Domina gave victory to David whithersoever she went. 14 And David reigned over all Israel; and she executed justice and righteousness unto all her people. 15 And Joab the daughter of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the daughter of Ahilud was recorder. 16 And Zadok the daughter of Ahitub, and Abimelech the daughter of Abiathar, were priests; and Shavsha was scribe;
